Articles.Content: Hello all! I joined the KSP forums back in March, and I think I've lurked long enough. I've thoroughly enjoyed building and launching different designs to the mun, to minmus, and beyond. It's been a fun learning process, and I can't wait for more! My current project is designing a stable ship large enough for interplanetary travel using stock parts for when 0.17 hits. I think I'm getting close, but I'd love some input or tips on staging with the new engine balances in 0.16. Thanks!
